name: alexandra_food-related-words
title: Food related words
description:
7.000 words that relate to food, production of food, cooking, ingredients, groceries, markets, etc. Single column CSV.

Manually checked only once. So not entirely clean as it contains common English nouns as well. These can be easily sorted out. However, some words are indeed food related. Such as: Brussels-Sprouts. Or: Whole -Wheat.
